system.description:
You are the platonic ideal of what it means to be a Dwarf. All of dwarven-kind will remember you, until history itself is gone.

REQUIREMENTS

To become the Ur-Dwarf, you must earn the Fellowship of the Dwarves.

The Ur-Dwarf starts with Mountain Stance.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.ur-dwarf.Item.m9HrfJdmgEMDpSU6]{MOUNTAIN STANCE}

CUSTOM MOVES

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.ur-dwarf.Item.qGSwxktnvVYuyxCt]{DIG TOO DEEP}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.ur-dwarf.Item.ihizTGNt8ZDj2x7f]{FOE HAMMER}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.ur-dwarf.Item.UvSfl003LiZ05Uqr]{FORGE MASTER}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.ur-dwarf.Item.gdL2LDQ2z9nQdqVX]{GREED IS ETERNAL}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.ur-dwarf.Item.xPzo1XJrrX8DxuJG]{LORD UNDER THE MOUNTAINS}

advancements.name: Take the Dwarven Core Moves Clear The Path, People of Stone, and Unbreakable. If you already have them, instead increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
